entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
